name: Escaped
description:
https://shootemgames.jimdofree.com/

!Warining : For a better experience disable the hotkeys, to do that you press LeftShift and check the warning box.

A platformer shooting game following the story of a prisoner who escaped prinson. 4 dificult levels.

He is helped by a ninja gang to escape prison but the price is to do some things for them. 

-Kill a gangster outpost;

-Destroy an MC house;

-Steal gold from gangsters.

Contros:

A,D - move Left and Right

W - Jump

LeftShift - Shoot

E - Interact/Pick Up Object

R - Reload Level

Esc - Exit the game
